title: Developer Response for Reviews - How the opt out by user should actually work
body: Just like an user have right for review, so should developers be able to RESPOND TO EACH AND EVERY REVIEWS submitted to the Store. If an user plans to opt out from a response from developer, DO NOT EMAIL THE USER A RESPONSE, but STILL ALLOW A RESPONSE TO MADE PUBLICLY VISIBLE.

comments.body: This is similar to one I requested and was closed
